Structs/Item.html#/s:17HGRippleRadarView.name: init(uniqueKey:value:)
Structs/Item.html#/s:17HGRippleRadarView.abstract: A new item initialized with the unique key and value

Structs/Animation.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.name: transform(from:to:)
Structs/Animation.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.abstract: Animation by changing the scale using transform

Structs/Animation.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.name: transform(times:values:duration:)
Structs/Animation.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.abstract: Animation by changing the scale using transform

Structs/Animation.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.name: hide()
Structs/Animation.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.abstract: Animation to hide views, using transform and changing the scale to 0.0

Structs/Animation.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.name: group(animations:duration:)
Structs/Animation.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.abstract: Allows multiple animations to be grouped and run concurrently.

Protocols/RadarViewDelegate.html#/s:17HG.name: radarView(radarView:didSelect:)
Protocols/RadarViewDelegate.html#/s:17HG.abstract: Tells the delegate that the specified item is selected.

Protocols/RadarViewDataSource.html#/s:17.name: radarView(radarView:viewFor:preferredSize:)
Protocols/RadarViewDataSource.html#/s:17.abstract: Asks for the view of a particular item

Protocols/RadarViewDataSource.html.name: RadarViewDataSource
Protocols/RadarViewDataSource.html.abstract: Responsible for providing the views required by a RadarView, if this protocol is not implemented the default view is used

Protocols/RadarViewDelegate.html.name: RadarViewDelegate
Protocols/RadarViewDelegate.html.abstract: Responsible to perform actions of the items of RadarView

Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.name: diskRadius
Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.abstract: The radius of the disk in the view center, the default value is 5

Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.name: diskColor
Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.abstract: The color of the disk in the view center, the default value is ripplePink color

Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.name: numberOfCircles
Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.abstract: The number of circles to draw around the disk, the default value is 3, if the forcedMaximumCircleRadius is used the number of drawn circles could be less than numberOfCircles

Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.name: circleOffColor
Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.abstract: The color of the off status of the circle, used for animation

Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.name: circleOnColor
Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.abstract: The color of the on status of the circle, used for animation

Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.name: minimumCircleRadius
Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.abstract: The minimum radius of circles, used to make space between the disk and the first circle, the radius must be grather than 5px , because if not the first circle will not be shown, the default value is 10, it’s recommanded to use a value grather than the disk radius if you would like to show circles outside disk

Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.name: animationDuration
Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.abstract: The duration of the animation, the default value is 0.9

Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.name: bounds
Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.abstract: The bounds rectangle, which describes the view’s location and size in its own coordinate system.

Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.name: init(frame:)
Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated view object with the specified frame rectangle.

Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.name: init(coder:)
Classes/RippleView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRa.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated view object from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/RadarView.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.name: radarCapacity
Classes/RadarView.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.abstract: the maximum number of items that can be shown in the radar view, if you use more, some layers will overlaying other layers

Classes/RadarView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRad.name: paddingBetweenItems
Classes/RadarView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRad.abstract: The padding between items, the default value is 10

Classes/RadarView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRad.name: bounds
Classes/RadarView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRad.abstract: The bounds rectangle, which describes the view’s location and size in its own coordinate system.

Classes/RadarView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRad.name: frame
Classes/RadarView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRad.abstract: The frame rectangle, which describes the view’s location and size in its superview’s coordinate system.

Classes/RadarView.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.name: dataSource
Classes/RadarView.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.abstract: The data source of the radar view

Classes/RadarView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRad.name: touchesEnded(_:with:)
Classes/RadarView.html#/c:@M@HGRippleRad.abstract: Tells this object that one or more new touches occurred in a view or window.

Classes/RadarView.html#/c:@CM@HGRippleRa.name: animationDidStop(_:finished:)
Classes/RadarView.html#/c:@CM@HGRippleRa.abstract: Tells the delegate the animation has ended.

Classes/RadarView.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.name: add(items:using:)
Classes/RadarView.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.abstract: Add a list of items to the radar view

Classes/RadarView.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.name: add(item:using:)
Classes/RadarView.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.abstract: Add item randomly in the radar view

Classes/RadarView.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.name: remove(item:)
Classes/RadarView.html#/s:17HGRippleRada.abstract: Remove item layer from the radar view
